name: Dead Rage: Prologue
description:
!!!NEW MAP ADDED!!!
!!!FREE FOR HALLOWEEN!!!

* * * The Bloodiest FPS mobile game!* * *
* * * The Top 1 of Act/Adv Game in over 30 countries!* * *

The ultimate Cool First Person Shooting Game! As REAL as it gets 3D graphic with explosive first person shooting experience!

Story
============
2012, a terrible virus is spreading fast......as a survivor, you have to face the endless infected zombies, but what worse is the mystery that lies behind the cause of the virus.

Human attacked by zombies will turn into them due to the virus. As a law enforcer, your job now is to protect human beings from being wiped out, and make yourself survive and DON’T turn into one of them!



Features
============
* RAGE Explosion system: Accumulate the anger from kills and headshots! When the Rage Gauge is full, the death screams of zombies will be heard!

* SPECIAL UI design for touch screen and easier to control.

* HIGH QUALITY 3D optimized to provide realism that you never experienced!

* COMBO system and targeting headshots will challenge your limits!

* ENDLESS challenging levels! Discover your potential as you blast through the waves of zombies!

———————————————————————————————————————
For latest news please visit our official website http://www.facebook.com/DeadRageGame
Video in http://www.youtube.com/user/DeadRageGame
